mapper.select: SELECT o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name, sum(b.book_price), COUNT(od.order_count) as total_order_count FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_details od ON o.ono = od.ono INNER JOIN member m on o.member_id=m.member_id INNER JOIN book b ON od.bno = b.bno INNER JOIN book_image bi ON b.bno = bi.bno GROUP BY o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name;

SELECT o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name, od.order_total, sum(b.book_price), sum(o.point_earn) as average_point_earned, COUNT(od.order_count) as total_order_count, d.zip_code, d.receiver_name FROM orders o INNER JOIN order_details od ON o.ono = od.ono INNER JOIN member m on o.member_id=m.member_id INNER JOIN book b ON od.bno = b.bno INNER JOIN book_image bi ON b.bno = bi.bno INNER JOIN delivery d on o.dno= d.dno GROUP BY o.ono, b.book_title, bi.image_name, od.order_total, d.zip_code, d.receiver_name;f
